tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE text_data (id INT, text_data TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE processed_text (id INT, original_text_id INT, processed_text TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE text_data_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,name TEXT,data TEXT,timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE document_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,title TEXT,author TEXT,is_processed BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE word_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,word TEXT,document_id INT);
CREATE TABLE sentence_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY,content TEXT,document_id INT);
